title: Post terrible video games that you actually liked
body:
You know, games that you knew were bad but couldn't stop playing anyway. I feel like the bad games for handheld were pretty obviously bad, but there were a lot of terrible playstation games I just couldn't put down for some reason.
The one I remember first is this:
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/a7/Dark_Cloud_PS2_Game_cover.jpg
I just liked getting all of the little object orbs and putting the towns back together. Actually... I wouldn't mind playing this one again either.
